issue.title: Which version of gzweb should I use?

content.raw:
I recommend trying out 1.4.0 or `default` branch for gazebo versions 7 and above.  

There maybe a chance that 1.4.0 still works with gazebo2 but gazebo2 has EOL’d so no guarantees

2\.0.0 was experimental and there has not been any development on it for a while.

‌
